TopicTitle: How was your day and what did you do?

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

I was in a good mood today so I decided to go work on my \'95 Dodge Dakota in the garage. Now, this baby has been a real pain lately with its fuel pump going out. So I decided to order one from Amazon and when it finally arrived a day ago, I thought today would be an awesome day to work on it.

Then I had another thought!

Why not share my experience? Invite other people to do the same! Sounds like a great idea, huh?

I thought so. So what this thread is all about is letting you share your day either in words or, in my case, pictures and words. You are not obligated to post images of yourself, so don\'t feel obliged to just because I did. Your privacy is above anyone elses and don\'t feel intimidated to compromise it if you value it highly.

Anyway, here\'s some photos I took from my phone in the six hour process of dropping the tank, cleaning around, checking my truck and finally getting everything assembled.

Funny side note. Mechanics here will note I forgot to replace the metal guard on my tank! Ho ho ho! That really was a trip using two jacks, maintaining the full tank at its height, taking the metal straps off and putting the guard on while redoing everything again. That\'s why it took so long!

Kinda fun huh? Boy am I tired after that! Well, onto another adventure.

So, forum, how was your day?

-Drakomis

Well, I got up and played with FL studio. Then I had to go to hell, errm, school. And I was schooled.

When I got home was interesting. There was a note on the computer monitor (strategic placement by mom) saying my brother got his tooth pulled and was staying with a friend. So, I played around with FL studio some more.

Accomplishments for the day:

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/48481896/Midi/Wav/strings2.wav

And now I\'m doing Engrish homework and am about to join Phox on his server.

BTW, Drak, you look 93% like my engineering teacher. Creepy!

Then I had to go to hell, errm, school. And I was schooled.

same

Horrible.

Tomorrow I have to get a stupid shot.

Other than that I had a good time landing crashing into the mun...

Time to get landing gear.

Um well

Listening to dubstep and doing school work that\'s all.

BTW, Drak, you look 93% like my engineering teacher. Creepy!

I wonder what his name is? Haha. I sure don\'t work at any school though, so I highly doubt I am!

Got up, went to my physics recitation. From what we looked at of past exams, the upcoming one shouldn\'t be too bad. Mostly concept questions, I like concept questions. Then I went to my statics class, learned some stuff about analyzing frames, I like statics, I can see so many uses for what we are learning. Then I had lunch in the band lounge. Read off a bunch of names from here, then went to my math lecture. It was all review for tonight\'s exam. After math, I went to my thermodynamics class, I think I fell asleep, but there weren\'t any gaps in my notes and just one random line out of place so I\'m not entirely sure. I went back to the band lounge, did some of my statics homework, then went to my exam. It was a lot harder than I expected, somehow the math department here can take even a simple topic and make it insanely complicated. Then I came home and found a letter in my mailbox from my girlfriend!

Well besides finding out I\'m having a baby girl and giving her a name two days ago? 'Ariadne Michelle' by the way, I\'m having a great day and enjoying some City of Heroes and Eve Online before some TV with the wife.

I\'ve only got a few decent pics, but here\'s one of me at Naval Medical Center Portsmouth VA,

I was a Hospital Corpsman for a few years, and in that pic I\'m in my BDU\'s because I was Fleet Hospital Detachment. As a little background.

Well besides finding out I\'m having a baby girl and giving her a name two days ago? 'Ariadne Michelle' by the way, I\'m having a great day and enjoying some City of Heroes and Eve Online before some TV with the wife.

I\'ve only got a few decent pics, but here\'s one of me at Naval Medical Center Portsmouth VA,

I was a Hospital Corpsman for a few years, and in that pic I\'m in my BDU\'s because I was Fleet Hospital Detachment. As a little background.

*Salute* 8)

I left school at 11:45AM because of a half day but then for Tri-M Music Honors Society I stayed until 4:00PM selling candy bars for one dollar, our group of 3 raised 70 dollars. (One of us sold nothing, and I sold 3-5.) It was during book fair so there were books about 3 feet away.

Nice day.

Oh and I slept at 4:20 for about four hours, then I opened my laptop to go on the forums and blanked for about 1 hour 40 minutes.
Woke up, had breakfast, went to school for a meeting (meeting day today), waited until my 24 hour ban ran out then here I am.

=

Mind blown.
Imposter! You\'re not made of bones!

Today, I...

-Got up at 11.00

-Stared at wall for 30 minutes. (Literally.)

-Made breakfast.

-Cranked up generator.

-Got on computer and did hell school.

-Shot squirrels.

-KSP!!!!!

=

Mind blown.

SHHH! Don\'t tell anyone.....

Imposter! You\'re not made of bones!

...uh....uh....uh....

*runs away*

Let\'s see:

Woke up.

Ate breakfast.

Went to school. Went driving with my Driver\'s Ed instructor [practicing lane changes].

Had lunch.

Went home.

Was disappointed in ULA for scrubbing the Atlas launch.

Did computer stuff.

Aaand that\'s about it.

My day in bullets:

*Woke up to the sound suburbia

*Went to school; learned that the Mexicans have knack for making everything devil-related (i.e. Los Diablos, Los Diablos Tejanos (Translation: The Devil Texans, referring to the Texas Rangers), Diablo Canyon, etc.)

*Found out the girl I liked may like me, will be asking out to ice skating on Tuesday

*Went to Wal*Mart and bought some assorted snacks

*Returned to my home and fired up Blender

*Worked on school project (7th grade may not require it, but I like outdoing every other student)

*Fired up KSP and subsequently caused the deaths of many, many Kerbalnauts

Thats what I call a productive day.

My yesterday:

[list type=decimal]

[li]Wake up and turn computer on.[/li]

[li]Go back to sleep.[/li]

[li]Wake up and remember I have work to do.[/li]

[li]Browse internet in denial of work to do.[/li]

[li]Leave house.[/li]

[li]Leave meeting knowing less than I did going in (as usual).[/li]

[li]More internet.[/li]

[li]Make dinner (steak and ale pie is highlight of the day!).[/li]

[li]More internet.[/li]

[li]Play KSP[/li]

[li]More Internet.[/li]

[li]Look at time, decide that sleep will be a good idea since I need to get up early tomorrow.[/li]

[li]More internet.[/li]

[li]Sleep.[/li]

I want to know what how Harv his day is

Daily habits in a nutshell:

-Wake up

-Internet/games

-Class (going home and browse internet, play games, or music production)

-Music production or study (1800 onwards)

-Sleep (or sometimes stay up till the next day, depends)
